summary: Implements a ConvNeXt building block for TensorFlow, applying a depthwise convolution followed by layer‑norm, a pointwise linear expansion, GELU activation, a second pointwise linear projection, and optional stochastic depth, all operating in NHWC format.
business_intent: Provides a reusable, high‑performance component for constructing ConvNeXt‑based vision models in TensorFlow, facilitating scalable and efficient image feature extraction.
